Summary: I saw what appeared to be white lites rotating.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Andover
There were no other sightings in Andover on or around November 30th 1990
divs: Sighting Detailsi was twelve or thirteen when one evening just before dark i was pulling into the driveway with my parents in andover ks. they went inside but for some reason i stayed outsise it was a partly cloudy day really quite perfect for kansas no wind not cold as i stood on my driveway looking up at some clouds thats when i noticed the object it appeared out of thin air but all i could see is these lights a bright but soft light they were rotating counter-clockwise around what could have been a disc shape craft but the craft itself was invisible i was in shock for about the first second or two but then i became inthrawled with it i wanted to see a definate sign of this is a ufo it was so close to me across the street form my driveway there was a streetlite it was stationary about twenty feet away from the top of the pole i could have thrown arock and hit it then as the lites were going around then a different shaped lite started to flash in my direction from the center of the ufo it flashed rapidly then just as it had appeared it vanished i am a construction worker now i can judge the size of things good it was to small for a human to fit in
